citation.article-title: Isosphaera pallida, gen. and comb. nov., a gliding, budding eubacterium from hot springs

p.s: Description of Isospaera pallida sp. nov.
Synonyms. Isocystis pallida Woronichin 1927 - as blue green alga (cyanobacterium), Torulopsidosira pallida (Woronichin) Geitler 1963 - as a yeast.
The type species for Isocystis is I. messanensis Borzi 1878 (Bornet and Flahault 1888).
Kah-nee-ta Hot Springs, Warm Springs Indian Reservation, Warm Springs, Oregon, USA.
It is deposited in the culture collection of thermophilic microorganisms, Dept. of Biology, Univ. of Oregon, Eugene, Oregon, USA and the ATCC.
